constituent: harden, pent in, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth
heisigStory: Old . . . pent in. Leave the people out of your story to avoid complications later when we add the element for person to form a new kanji (Frame 1047).
koohiiStory1: Fossils are old things pent in that have hardened.
koohiiStory2: Remember Metapod from Pokemon? All it used was harden, which kept it pent in until it grew old enough to evolve into Butterfree..
kunYomi: かた.める、かた.まる、かた.まり、かた.い
myStory: làm cứng lên, mạnh lên. người già luôn miệng nói làm cố, khoẻ lên.
readingExamples: 固い (かた.い), 固まる (かた.まる), 固める (かた.める)
words: to harden, to freeze, to fortify
firm (not viscous or easily moved), stubborn, certain, solemn
harden, solidify, become firm, become certain
